mapper.select: select * from cart where m_id=#{m_id} and p_num=#{p_num}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(p_num, p_name, p_price, p_saleprice, p_su, m_id) values(#{p_num}, #{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{p_saleprice}, 1, #{m_id})
mapper.update: update cart set p_su = p_su + 1 where m_id=#{m_id} and p_num=#{p_num}
update cart set p_su = #{p_su} where cart_idx = #{cart_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into shop_t (category, p_num, p_name, p_company, p_price, p_saleprice, p_image_s, p_image_l, p_content, p_date) values(#{category}, #{p_num}, #{p_name}, #{p_company}, #{p_price}, #{p_saleprice}, #{p_image_s}, #{p_image_l}, #{p_content}, sysdate())
